title: Cup And Saucer, ca. 1730
description: Cup circular, without handle; tall, with raised ribbing two- thirds of the way up its side. Saucer has curved sides, raised circular rim at centre with four breaks, and radiating raised ribs half way towards edges. Decorated with blue conventional pattern of foliage and scrolls about edges.

tombstone.epitaph: Cup And Saucer, ca. 1730.Soft-paste porcelain, underglaze decoration. 1906-23-10-a,b.
